replies.body: Man Jarvan IV looks good.
i dont get it.
It was before your time young one.

There is a theory that LB is J4. It is a rather old theory so it is before your time probably but thats fine. Basically there was some things that hinted at it. For example there is a huge picture with Noxus fighting Demacia. In this picture J4 is facing off against Swain. Swain has this part in his clothes that shows a reflection of J4's face. Instead of showing his face there instead is the face of a woman that appears to be LB.
An old story from the Journal of Justice. Here's one of the associated artworks. http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/Journal%20of%20Justice/Issue%2025/JoJ%20Project%20NEW.JPG

Ah the good old days of the tribunal and the journals of justice....no one reads them anymore. Good to find someone who knows what they are talking about. The reflected face of leblanc in swains breastplate...man i love riot.
I see what you did there {{item:2043}}

{{champion:7}} Once that fool Sion eats this apple it will turn him into one of us. So he'll stop cutting down trees

{{champion:120}} And you think that will work I mean isn't he kinda ruthless.

{{champion:60}} Well anything is better than him.

{{champion:432}} Bleep! Boop! beep!

{{champion:60}} He never shuts up.

{{champion:7}} You shut up he's coming.

{{champion:14}} (skiping )La la la la oh look an apple this looks so delicious I can't wait to eat it.

{{champion:120}} It's working!

{{champion:14}} Is what I would of said if I wasn't dead and didn't need to eat. (skips away)

{{champion:7}} Oh right I forgot about that.

{{champion:60}} Nice job what are we going to do with that apple now.

{{champion:121}} Oh yeah an apple (bites into apple and turns in to a flower) What the heck!

{{champion:7}} Well there goes the apple but we got an interesting new member who we can use. He he he evil laughter he he.

{{champion:432}} Bleep! Your laugh needs work. Beep

{{champion:7}} Who asked you!

Kha'zix eats apples? 

Guess he's real about the change thing.. Vegatarian Kha'zix needs to be a skin now.
Why can't you just assume he's an omnivore
He only has sharp teeth.

Now i want a "candyland" teemo. where the mushrooms are replaced with gumdrops.

or you too need to just learn how to deal with him.
 
{{champion:17}} never needs to be removed. Too easy to deal with. {{champion:238}} though not a balanced champ at all.

honestly I've never got what the teemo hate was about. I've neve lost lane to him, his mushrooms are a joke unless some idiot fed him. He is is outscaled by many of the tops he supposedly counters you just need to not feed and not tilt in other words be less bronze. some of the best players revert to a totally bronze play stile when they come up against teemo. I've beaten him with old shen, old garen, shyvana, malphite, and if you see the teemo and can counter he has several hard counters first on the list is chogath. seriously teemo just has poison and blind so ppl tilt when they should just buy b-veil then beat him to a pulp, take his turret, kill his friends, and let him be the salty one because you know he's one of those ppl.
I think I'm the only one that wants a pool party yasuo skin... I want to run around hitting people with a pool noodle.
